info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pike County through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dingmans Ferry, or 9 miles southwest of Montague, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blooming Grove, Milford, Pecks Pond, Dingmans Ferry, Promised Land State Park, Tamiment and Lords Valley. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 30 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
